short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move your Tweets to Lens Protocol with Lens Share

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension adds "Share on Lens" button to the opened tweet, so you can directly move it over to the Lens Protocol ðŸŒ¿

The tweet text & attached photos automatically get uploaded to IPFS in the background, you only have to sign the message in your wallet & post it to Lens.
